attributes.action: ban all quorn products from the world and enforce people who want to eat fake meat, eat proper meat!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Quorn is fake meat. It looks like meat. It feels like meat and it tastes like meat. But it is not meat.

What is the point?

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
